metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2845 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
Improper Validation of Specified Quantity in Input in GitHub repositoryvim/vim prior to 9.0.0218.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2845` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.12
vim-athena - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.12
vim-common - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.12
vim-gnome - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.12
vim-gtk - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.12
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.12
vim-gui-common - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.12
vim-nox - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.12
vim-runtime - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.12
vim-tiny - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.12
xxd - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.12').
